Fatima Ben Saïdane (a mụrụ na 25 Disemba 1949), bụ onye Tunisia na-eme ihe nkiri. Otu n'ime ogidi ndị mbụ nke ihe nkiri sinima Tunisia, a maara ya nke ọma maka ọrụ ya na ihe nkiri ndị a ma ama nke a na-akpọ Making Of, Halfaouine: Boy of the Terraces na Thala My Love.
A mụrụ ya n'abalị 25, ọnwa Disemba, afọ 1949 na Tunis, Tunisia.
Fatima malitere ọrụ ihe nkiri ya n'afọ 1989 na ihe nkiri Arab ma rụọ obere ọrụ 'Asfour'
N'otu afọ ahụ, o mere ihe nkiri Layla, Ma Raison
N'afọ 1990, ọ rụrụ ọrụ 'Salouha' na ihe nkiri Halfaouine: Boy of the Terraces

Mgbe ọtụtụ obere ọrụ nkwado na ngwụcha afọ 1990, ọ pụtara na ihe nkiri isii dị mkpirikpi na ihe ngosi n'afọ 2006: 10 Courts, 10 Regards, Dementia, Me, My Sister and the Thing, Mrs Bahja, Making Of na The TV Is Coming.
